p: Kinda Mohamadieh is legal advisor and senior researcher with the Third World Network office in Geneva. Her work covers WTO processes and negotiations, international investment governance and business and human rights. Previously, she served as senior researcher for seven years with the South Centre. She also worked with the Arab NGO Network for Development. Kinda holds an LL.M. in International Economic Law from the University of Lausanne, a master’s degree in Public Affairs from the University of California – Los Angeles (UCLA), and an undergraduate degree in economics. She is currently PhD candidate at the international law department of the Graduate Institute in Geneva.
